title: context
content: # `prefect.concurrency.context` ## Classes ### `ConcurrencyContext` **Methods:** #### `get` ```python theme={null} get(cls: type[Self]) -> Optional[Self] ``` Get the current context instance #### `model_copy` ```python theme={null} model_copy(self: Self) -> Self ``` Duplicate the context model, optionally choosing which fields to include, exclude, or change. **Returns:** * A new model instance. #### `serialize` ```python theme={null} serialize(self, include_secrets: bool = True) -> dict[str, Any] ``` Serialize the context model to a dictionary that can be pickled with cloudpickle.
